DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate pharmacokinetics ( PK ) single dose PEGylated Interferon Beta-1a ( BIIB017 ) administer subcutaneous participant renal impairment participant normal renal function ( healthy participant ) . A secondary objective study study population evaluate safety tolerability single dose PEGylated Interferon Beta-1a administer subcutaneous .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-Dose , Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic ( PK/PD ) , & Safety Study BIIB017 Participants With Renal Impairment & Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , multicenter , non-randomized , serial-group study estimate effect renal impairment BIIB017 PK/PD . The study conduct approximately 3 site US enroll approximately 35 participant : 6 healthy volunteer ( normal renal function ) , 9 mild renal impairment , 6 moderate renal impairment , 8 severe renal impairment , 6 participant end stage renal disease require hemodialysis 2 3 time week .
DOC.criteria: Key Subjects must stable renal disease ( i.e. , change disease status within last month ) determine Investigator laboratory clinical finding support diagnosis renal impairment . Must body mass index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m2 inclusive . Key History clinically unstable ( past 6 month prior screen ) cardiac , endocrinologic , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , major disease determine Investigator .
